description: This file is a shell script used to schedule reboot cron jobs by reading configuration settings and modifying the system cron table. It manages timing calculations, checks for existing scheduled jobs, and logs actions.

methods.name: calcRebootExecTime
methods.description: Calculates the reboot cron execution time based on configuration files, adjusting time by 15 minutes.

methods.name: ScheduleCron
methods.description: Schedules the cron job for reboot if not already scheduled, by modifying the crontab.
